languages.text: Многие удивлялись терпимости, с которой Кибелла относилась к очевидным знакам отступничества Вольного Торговца. Однако настал день, и Неумирающий указал Кибелле, что Домин пора уйти.

Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.
languages.original_text: Многие удивлялись терпимости, с которой Кибелла относилась к очевидным знакам отступничества Вольного Торговца. Однако настал день, и Неумирающий указал Кибелле, что Домин пора уйти.

traits.locale_text: Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day arrived when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that Domin must depart.
Many were surprised at the tolerance Kibellah showed toward clear signs of the Rogue Trader's apostasy. However, a day came from the Emperor's Tarot told Kibellah it was the Domin's time to go.

Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.
Many were surprised at the tolerance Kibellah shown toward clear signs of the Rogue Trader's apostasy. However, a day came when the Emperor's Tarot told Kibellah it was the Domin's time to go.

Many were surprised at the tolerance Kibellah showed toward clear signs of the Rogue Trader's apostasy. However, a day came when the Emperor's Tarot told Kibellah it was the Domin's time to go.

Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day arrived when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that Domin must depart.

Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.

languages.text: Viele bewunderten die Toleranz, mit der Kibellah den offensichtlichen Zeichen von Apostasie seitens {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} begegnete. Aber schließlich kam der Tag, an dem der Todlose Kibellah offenbarte, dass die Zeit {mf|des|der} Domin gekommen war.
languages.original_text: Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.

traits.locale_text: Viele bewunderten die Toleranz, mit der Kibellah den offensichtlichen Zeichen von Apostasie seitens {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} begegnete. Aber schließlich kam der Tag, an dem der Todlose Kibellah offenbarte, dass die Zeit {mf|des|der} Domin gekommen war.

languages.text: La tolérance de Kibellah face aux preuves évidentes attestant l'apostasie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en étonna plus d'un. Cependant, le jour vint où l'Immortel lui révéla que l'heure du départ de {mf|son|sa} Domin avait sonné.
languages.original_text: Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.

traits.locale_text: La tolérance de Kibellah face aux preuves évidentes attestant l'apostasie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en étonna plus d'un. Cependant, le jour vint où l'Immortel lui révéla que l'heure du départ de {mf|son|sa} Domin avait sonné.

languages.text: Muchos quedaron sorprendidos por la tolerancia mostrada por Kibellah hacia la evidente apostasía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, llegó el día en el que el Inmortal le dijo a Kibellah que había llegado la hora de su Domin.
languages.original_text: Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.

traits.locale_text: Muchos quedaron sorprendidos por la tolerancia mostrada por Kibellah hacia la evidente apostasía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, llegó el día en el que el Inmortal le dijo a Kibellah que había llegado la hora de su Domin.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの灰今日の明らかな兆候に対してキベラが示した寛容さには、多くの者が驚いていた。しかし、その日はやってきた。皇帝陛下の占い札がドミンの逝く時が来たと告げる日が。
languages.original_text: Many were surprised at the tolerance Kibellah showed toward clear signs of the Rogue Trader's apostasy. However, a day came when the Emperor's Tarot told Kibellah it was the Domin's time to go.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの灰今日の明らかな兆候に対してキベラが示した寛容さには、多くの者が驚いていた。しかし、その日はやってきた。皇帝陛下の占い札がドミンの逝く時が来たと告げる日が。

languages.text: 行商浪人做出了明显的叛教行为，但绮贝菈却始终容忍着这一切，这让很多人诧异不已。然而某一天，不死之神却向绮贝菈传达了预示——秘者的大限到了。
languages.original_text: Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人做出了明显的叛教行为，但绮贝菈却始终容忍着这一切，这让很多人诧异不已。然而某一天，不死之神却向绮贝菈传达了预示——秘者的大限到了。

languages.text: Birçokları, Kibellah'nın Hür Tacir'in bariz kâfirlik belirtilerine gösterdiği hoşgörüye karşı şaşkındı. Ancak Ölmeyen'in Kibellah'ya Domin'in göçme vakti geldiğini açıkladığı gün en nihayetinde geldi çattı.
languages.original_text: Many marvelled at the tolerance with which Kibellah regarded the Rogue Trader's obvious signs of apostasy. But the day came when the Undying One revealed to Kibellah that it was time for the Domin to depart.

traits.locale_text: Birçokları, Kibellah'nın Hür Tacir'in bariz kâfirlik belirtilerine gösterdiği hoşgörüye karşı şaşkındı. Ancak Ölmeyen'in Kibellah'ya Domin'in göçme vakti geldiğini açıkladığı gün en nihayetinde geldi çattı.
